api.description: Get a previously created group under the connection.
Invite Azure AD B2B Guest User using Application Permission

query.name: validationToken
query.description: random validation token passed by the Microsoft Graph when validating the notificationURL

api.description:
Allows you to validate whether the notification endpoint you are building properly passed Microsoft Graph Subscription creation validation.
The response content type should be text/plain, code 200 OK and the body the information passed by the validationToken query parameter
